feed.title: BIP Booby Trapped Wallets - Covenant-Only Taproot Outputs

entry.title: BIP Booby Trapped Wallets - Covenant-Only Taproot Outputs
entry.summary: In a recent communication, a programmer expressed uncertainty regarding the presentation of a Bitcoin Improvement Proposal (BIP). Despite following a provided guide, the individual has not received any feedback and is concerned about the visibility of their submission or potential errors in the process. This situation underscores the challenges faced by contributors in navigating the BIP submission protocol and highlights the need for clear guidelines and feedback mechanisms within the Bitcoin development community.
